scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/kepler-bun-proxy && bun -e "import { copyFileSync } from 'node:fs'; copyFileSync('config.json', 'dist/config.json');"
scripts.clear:logs: bun -e "import { existsSync, mkdirSync, readdirSync, rmSync, readFileSync } from 'node:fs'; import { join, resolve } from 'node:path'; const cfg = JSON.parse(readFileSync('config.json', 'utf8')); const debugPath = resolve(cfg.debugPath || './logs'); if (!existsSync(debugPath)) mkdirSync(debugPath, { recursive: true }); for (const entry of readdirSync(debugPath)) rmSync(join(debugPath, entry), { recursive: true, force: true });"
